Name: Margarita with Salt Foam Float
Ingredients: 90 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Combine first three ingredients, POUR into cream whipping siphon and CHARGE with nitrous oxide. Shake and place siphon in a refrigerator for one hour prior to making drink. SHAKE next three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. SQUIRT salt foam over surface of drink from siphon.
Review: Classic Margarita with a salty foam topping.
